WorkItem.Description:
When merging cells in the same row as a row set to auto height (i.e. $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getRowDimension('10)->setRowHeight(-1); ) the auto height setting is disabled or the row height somehow returns to the default row height.

Merging cells first and then setting row height has no effect on row height.

Merging cells after setting the row height returns the row height to some default.
WorkItem.Summary: Merging cells negates row auto size
